summary: This collection of documents pertains to the CIA's investigation into Albert Larrain Maestre and his alleged involvement in bombings with Rosenthal, as well as his connections to narcotics. The documents also delve into AMCLEVE/15's (Luis Clements POSADA-Carriles) contact with Frank "Lefty" ROSENTHAL, and his cooperation with the FBI in the investigation of Frank Rosenthal. It includes queries from the Department of Justice, and explores the possibility of using AMCLEVE/15 to assist Rosenthal in obtaining additional materials for an arrest.
title: Investigation into Albert Larrain Maestre and AMCLEVE/15's contact with Frank Rosenthal
